Name: Fragment with half of a face
Description: This glass fragment shows half of a feminine face, pale, standing out against a green background. One can also distinguish a brownish red wig surmounted by a head-cover and ornamented with a flower, a right eye with a black pupil and a dark eyebrow. The piece, which forms a group with a similar half  to form a single face, probably decorated a piece of furniture, a casket or a wall.
